front.title: IEEE Standard for Information Technology - Portable Operating System Interface (POSIX(TM)) - Technical Corrigendum 2
front.abstract: Technical Corrigendum 2 addresses problems discovered since the approval of the 2003 edition of The Open Group Base Specifications, Issue 6, IEEE Std 1003.1, and ISO/IEC 9945. These are mainly due to resolving integration issues raised by the merger of the original Base documents.
